io.parallec.core.actor

Class TcpWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • io.parallec.core.actor.TcpWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class TcpWorker
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    A worker for single TCP request class
    Author:
    Yuanteng (Jeff) Pei
